mapper.select: select pk_chargeinfo, ep_code, station_id, ep_gun_no, cac_conn_battry, cac_gun_close_status, cac_gun_lid_status, cac_car_conn_pile, cac_carplace_status, cac_card_reader_fault, cac_urgent_stop_fault, cac_arrester_fault, cac_insulation_check_fault, cac_gun_unconnect_warn, cac_trans_record_warn, cac_meter_error, cac_ac_in_vol_warn, cac_charge_over_temp, cac_ac_current_over_load, cac_output_relay, cac_charger_status, cac_output_voltage, cac_output_current, cac_lock_status, cac_soc, cac_charged_remain_time, cac_total_active_meternum, cac_charged_cost, cac_price, user_id, serialno, start_time from tbl_chargeinfo_ac where ep_code=#{ep_code} and ep_gun_no=#{ep_gun_no}
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_chargeinfo_ac ( ep_code, station_id, ep_gun_no,
cac_conn_battry, cac_gun_close_status, cac_gun_lid_status, cac_car_conn_pile, cac_carplace_status, cac_card_reader_fault, cac_urgent_stop_fault, cac_arrester_fault, cac_insulation_check_fault, cac_gun_unconnect_warn, cac_trans_record_warn, cac_meter_error, cac_ac_in_vol_warn, cac_charge_over_temp, cac_ac_current_over_load, cac_output_relay, cac_charger_status, cac_output_voltage, cac_output_current, cac_lock_status, cac_soc, cac_charged_time, cac_charged_remain_time, cac_total_active_meternum, cac_charged_cost, cac_price
) values ( #{ep_code}, #{station_id}, #{ep_gun_no}, #{linkCarStatus}, #{gunCloseStatus}, #{gunLidStatus}, #{commStatusWithCar}, #{carPlaceStatus}, #{cardReaderFault}, #{urgentStopFault}, #{arresterFault}, #{insulationCheckFault}, #{gunUnconnectWarn}, #{transRecordFullWarn}, #{meterError}, #{acInVolWarn}, #{chargeOverTemp}, #{acCurrentLoadWarn}, #{outRelayStatus}, #{workingStatus},
#{outVoltage}, #{outCurrent}, #{carPlaceLockStatus}, #{soc},
#{chargedTime}, #{chargeRemainTime}, #{totalActivMeterNum}, #{chargedCost}, #{chargePrice} )
mapper.update: update tbl_chargeinfo_ac set start_time=#{chargeStartTime}, start_dl=#{chargeStartMeterNum}, user_id=#{chargeUserId}, serialno=#{chargeSerialNo}, fronzeAmt=#{fronzeAmt} where ep_code=#{ep_code} and ep_gun_no=#{ep_gun_no}
